LanguageData.RV2_Dialog_RestartNotification: RimVore-2 settings had to be wiped and a game restart is required to properly destroy the old settings.\n\nNot restarting right now may break RV-2 and its settings menu, so it's highly encouraged to do so.
LanguageData.RV2_Dialog_RestartDeniedNotification: Oh well. The RimVore-2 mod and its settings menu will probably break. If you change your mind you can re-open this dialog and re-wipe the settings by looking at the DebugActions menu for RV-2.
LanguageData.RV2_PredatorSwitchedVoreGoal: {PREDATOR} changed the vore goal they used on {PREY} from {PREVIOUSGOAL} to {NEWGOAL}
LanguageData.RV2_VoreMentalBreakNoPathAvailable: Reason: Could not do desired vore for mental break
